trends: There has been one other sighting in Laveen
There were no other sightings in Laveen on or around May 24th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI set-up cam in stable position on wall looking south after noticing lights and trails in southern sky before sunrise. I took 5 minutes of video showing light trails and objects above horizon. I re-set cam in same location and position shortly after sunrise shooting another 5 minute clip. I re-set cam in same position approximately 9:30, for contrasting shot of earlier sightings, shooting 3 minutes followed by another 3 minute clip after changing the sharpness of the video on cam's internal adjustments, trying to get a better resolution. In each of the videos, I see what I had noticed as lights and shapes rising from the horizon between the buildings, center of frame. Lights and objects were visible with the naked eye as well as the camera, moving up, circling, then departing at high speed to the west for the most part; some departing to the east or south. Please find attached .mov files of incident.
Summary: Pre-dawn video, post-sunrise video, mid-morning video
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
Object Shape: Chevron, Circle, Diamond, Flash, Triangle, Other
